data.text:
NONTHABURI PROVINCE has floated a tender for Tender for a contract for the installation of the roof waterproofing system at Sri Sulalai Building And the Jesada Badin Building By electronic bidding method (e-bidding) (Project number: 63047223052). The project location is Thailand and the tender is closing on 03 May 2020. The tender notice number is , while the TOT Ref Number is 42456322. Bidders can have further information about the Tender and can request the complete Tender document by Registering on the site.
